nodes.text: Star Wars Adventures 14 is the fourteenth issue of the comic book series Star Wars Adventures. The comic was written by John Barber and Michael Moreci, and it was released by IDW Publishing on September 26, 2018. The backup story is part of the Flight of the Falcon publishing program.

Han has left to get himself into more trouble, leaving Chewie all alone with the perplexing new problem that is a major pain in his hide! The iconic Wookiee will have to use all of his strength, wits, and patience to overcome this latest danger!
